targets.expr:
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[5m]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[5m]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[5m])

max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[5m]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[5m]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[5m])

panels.description: Ratio of index entries scanned or whole docs scanned / number of documents returned

targets.expr: rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[$interval]) / ignoring(state) rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[$interval]) or (irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[5m]) / ignoring(state) irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[5m]))

panels.title: $service_name - Scan Ratios

panels.description: Ratio of index entries scanned or whole docs scanned / number of documents returned

targets.expr: rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[$interval]) / ignoring(state) rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[$interval]) or (irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[5m]) / ignoring(state) irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[5m]))

panels.title: $service_name - Scan Ratios

targets.expr: sum by (service_name) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"scanned_objects"}) / ignoring(state)sum by (service_name) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"scanned_objects|scanned"})

sum by (service_name) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"scanned_objects"}) / ignoring(state)sum by (service_name) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"scanned_objects|scanned"})
